name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven GenAI Engineer with 9+ years of experience in leveraging **Python** for developing ML/AI solutions and optimizing large datasets for complex applications. Expert in implementing **MLOps** practices, working with **LLM APIs**, and designing robust **RAG pipelines**. Proficient in **Vector embeddings**, **Agent frameworks**, and cloud-based **Cloud AI platforms** for seamless integration of AI capabilities. A strong background in **Data engineering** and **ETL** processes, enabling effective data management and transformation. Adept in **GenAI UX development** and fine-tuning **LLMs** for enhanced performance and user experience. Known for exceptional problem-solving, analytical, and teamwork skills, complemented by a proven track record of driving successful project outcomes and facilitating clear communication across multidisciplinary teams.
